summary:
High Detailed rock and Mountain textures with AO (ambient occlusion) in texture and parallax.
Res: 4K-2K-1K
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0PEtVO4.png[/img]

[center]
My other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66043/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Enemies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65610/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dwemer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59563/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Caves[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58461/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragons 4K-8K[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Clouds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38539/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42348/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragonborn[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53210/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Farmhouses[/url][/center]


High Detailed rock and mountain textures with AO (ambient occlusion) in texture and parallax.
Natural texture and realistic. You can choose between 4K textures, 2K textures or 1K textures.

I Recommend 2K for visual/performance.
4K for those who take pictures and can handle the resolution
1K for those with low VRAM graphics cards.


Install:
Install one of the main files.
If you want parallax download it under optional if you have ENB. It Gives better depth and structure to the mountains.

[youtube]WIcL1uAZozU[/youtube][youtube]fwytdNplvvM[/youtube][youtube]ikcThhAenZw[/youtube]

[center][/center]


Credits:
Thanks to Hein84 for his meshes, saved me a lot of time
author: Frozunswaidon

files.name: Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Mountain - 1K
files.changelogHtml:
Huge update, Completely new mountain texture for mountainslab01 and also new HQ NormalMap.
This time, with some really beautiful moss and a amazingly much sharper mountain/rock texture!

files.name: SRTO Mountain parallax with meshes -Best Quality
files.changelogHtml:
Here comes a huge update. New meshes (thanks hein) with better uv mapping.
New Parallax files with better and this time uncompressed for better looking in game and also made them stronger.
New textures that has better transition and looks even better.
Enjoy!
